name: Shawarma Food Jab Joint
description:
Jab food to make perfect grill skewer combos for the high score!

"Shawarma Food Jab Joint" is a physics-based match-4 game, where you jab food with your skewer and knock over everything as you create the perfect combinations of grilled food.

Controls:

- Move your mouse to control the skewer
- Hold LMB to lock and aim your skewer
- Release LMB to jab your skewer

All art, audio and 95% of code was made during GMTK Jam 2021.

Contributors:
Soondun - Sune

busser - Dennis

LaurJam - Jonas
